name: A Brief Time in Anivus
description:
"H E L  L O ! Welcome to Anivus' one and only general store, Necessities and Novelties. Home to FAMOUS hot cocoa and ENTERPRISE of th- "

"Alright, alright Mick. Introductions are for people you haven't met."

"Gotta leave something for the regulars to look forward to though, don't you think?"

Anivus is a remote town, with a small population of 30 or so residents. Known for its eternal snow. Play as Mick, a relatively new resident of the town who runs the town's only general store, "Necessities & Novelties". Run the shop, chat with the townsfolk, sell some hot cocoa.

Maybe learn why it's never stopped snowing.

Welcome to Anivus.
